      • attachPhaseExecute

        @RequestMapping(value="/attackPhase/attack")
public java.lang.String attachPhaseExecute(@RequestParam(value="attackingCountry",defaultValue="null")
                                                                                        java.lang.String attackingCountry,
                                                                                        @RequestParam(value="attackingDiceCount",defaultValue="0")
                                                                                        java.lang.String attackingDiceCount,
                                                                                        @RequestParam(value="defendingCountry",defaultValue="null")
                                                                                        java.lang.String defendingCountry,
                                                                                        @RequestParam(value="defendingDiceCount",defaultValue="0")
                                                                                        java.lang.String defendingDiceCount,
                                                                                        @RequestParam(value="skipAttack",defaultValue="0")
                                                                                        java.lang.String skipAttack,
                                                                                        @RequestParam(value="allOutMode",defaultValue="0")
                                                                                        java.lang.String allOutMode)
        Attach phase execute.
        Parameters:
        attackingCountry - the attacking country
        attackingDiceCount - the attacking dice count
        defendingCountry - the defending country
        defendingDiceCount - the defending dice count
        skipAttack - the skip attack
        allOutMode - the all out mode
        Returns:
        the string
